entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Screenshots taken using IScreenshot.CaptureAsync don't include popups or visible alerts #23731
  • [iOS, 9.0 Preview 6] SkiaSharp 3.0 Preview 4.1 has a severe memory leak on iOS #23728
  • [Windows][Bug] Shell shows as blank screen when returning from another page #23724
  • FlyoutItemIsVisible doesn't work for nested content #23720
    Backlog
  • Shell Tabs on Android are sometimes not visually removed from view when IsVisible is set to false. #23717
  • [MAUI] `File.Designer.cs` is not generated for `File.resx` placed in MAUI Library #23716
  • [Android] CarouselView + CollectionView performance issues #23715
  • XamlC XC0045 on Reference Bindings pointed to XAML #23711
  • [MAUI] I6_Grouping_VerticalItemSpacing :Grouped CollectionView have extra space #23708
    Backlog
  • Using Label's Style in ContentPage.Resources or not, it makes different appearance #23707
  • [MAUI]I1_Layout - The content of the long text items overlaps. #23705
    Backlog
  • [MAUI]I3_Specific item sizing - The page layout after horizontal rotation should not be close. #23704
    Backlog
  • [MAUI]I1_Layout-Vertical list and Grid content cannot adapt when the window is reduced #23702
    Backlog
  • [MAUI] I6_Grouping_VerticalItemSpacing page When the window is reduced in size, the Small &Big &Awesome strings are displayed repeatedly. #23701
    Backlog
  • [MAUI]I8_Header and Footer(Add Clear) - When added to items 4, the footer will disappear. #23700
    Backlog
  • [MAUI]I9_Scrolling with no jitter-The Static and Dynamic Height pages cannot be scrolled. #23698
    Backlog
  • [MAUI]I8_Header and Footer-The header and emptyview content are not displayed correctly #23697
    Backlog
  • [MAUI]I1_Layout - The layout of the Item is not in the same horizontal position when the 'UpdateColumns' button is clicked multiple times. #23696
    Backlog
  • [MAUI]I3_Sizing_Specific item sizing for horizontal list When the window is reduced, the content is not fully displayed. #23695
    Backlog

Closed

  • HybridWebView configuration to enable F12/browser dev tools #23663
    9.0-preview7
  • "FileSystem" doesn't work on .net maui 9 preview blazor hybrid "Web App" project #23718
  • Workload 8.0.61 breaks Mono interpreter on MacCatalyst. #23577
    .NET 8 SR8
  • [Binding SG] BindingSourceGen generates invalid code when referencing fields generated by XamlG #23531
    .NET 9 Planning
  • When resizing the application window in Windows, if the resizing is done horizontally then elements within the window will resize correctly, but if resizing is done only vertically then resizing does not occur. #23641
  • Android compatibility tests broken on net.9 #23713
    9.0-preview7
  • Splash screen and Material Icons not showing correctly on Android Release build, real device. #22999
  • XamlC error XFC0045 with maui dotnet 9 preview 3 #22318
    .NET 9 Planning
  • MAUI default project template Windows platform creation completed and running failed #23571
  • When starting a new activity that inherits from MauiAppCompatActivity throw a better exception #19233
    Backlog
  • Nunits/Xunits support only .net8.0 and cannot be written specifically for either .net8.0 android or ios #23568
  • Throwing in a background thread freezes the UI when debugging #21741
  • Switching from .net7.0-android to .net8.0-android causes 'missing java symbols errors' in runtime inside a .net8.0-android MAUI app #21102
  • [MAUI] Height is not considered for ViewCell #23312
  • Maui MediaPicker.Default.CapturePhotoAsync fails under iOS with no error message #23197
  • InvalidOperationException on MauiPage when runing in debug #23480
  • [iOS] Shapes in CollectionView will cause item height increase #23446
  • ArgumentException in Preferences.Get #23536
  • cannot disable animation when navigate back #23524
  • exception of type 'javax.crypto.aeadbadtag exception' was thrown when calling SecureStorage.Default.SetAsync on Android #22239
  • Android Crashes with "This window is already associated with an active Activity" when we use AppFlip #23645
  • The RealParent on XXX has been Garbage Collected #23691

PullRequests

Created

  • HybridWebView: Remove unneeded DefaultFile / HybridRoot handler properties #23730
    area-controls-hybridwebview
  • Account for safearea #23729
  • [Windows] Fix CollectionView DisconnectHandler SelectionMode Crash #23726
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-collectionview
  • Stop using `IPlatformSizeService` #23725
  • [net9.0] Obsolete the old mechanism for registrations #23723
  • [Binding SG] Use Binding.Create internally in MAUI #23722
  • [ci] Add scheduled push to nightly feed job #23721
    area-infrastructure
  • [Binding SG] Clean up #23714
  • [net9.0] Delete obsolete Mappers #23712
  • Obsolete compatibility layout #23710
    area-layout

Merged

  • [windows] Fix Updating the initial position #23709
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-collectionview
  • [Binding SG] Add warning when referencing results of other source generators #23646
  • Add the embedding sample #23647

Updated

  • Visual state change for disabled RadioButton #23471
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-radiobutton
  • Fixed the picker title's color #23075
    community ✨, area-controls-picker
  • NavigationBarColors from NavigationPage not changing on AppTheme changin - fix #23343
    platform/android 🤖, area-navigation, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-toolbar
  • CollectionView Items display issue when Header is resized on iOS - Fix #21812
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • [android] use cached value for `GetDisplayDensity()` #23666
    platform/android 🤖, t/perf
  • Use UIView.Window instead of the global window #23693
  • [android] improve performance of `ImageHandler.PlatformArrange()` #23665
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-image, t/perf
  • [Windows] ContentView and ScrollView also need to handle InputTransparent #23526
    area-layout
  • [X] deprecate fontImageExtension #23657
    area-fonts
  • [Windows] Add TitleBar Control #23019
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-window, .NET 9 Planning
  • [Windows] Subscribe pointer events only when needed #23515
    community ✨
  • [xaml] improve performance of `BindableProperty.TryConvert` #23685
    area-xaml, t/perf
  • [Binding SG] Dogfood binding source generator in the MAUI codebase #23393
  • [iOS] Fix Button image sizing and layout #22476
    platform/iOS 🍎, partner/cat 😻, area-controls-button
  • Use DialogFragment for Android modals #22869
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-dialogalert
  • Obsolete setting mainpage via application #23692
  • Add embedding sample and code #23642
  • [ci] Use drop service for SDK insertion artifacts #23658
    area-infrastructure
  • [net8.0] Update net8.0 to Sonoma and iOS #23655
    area-infrastructure
  • Fire Navigation Events on Root Window Page #23420
  • [Binding SG] Add warning when trying to access private members #23671
  • [iOS] Fixed auto picker resizing after selection #20207
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-picker
  • Android ecosystem updates 20240618 based on net9.0 branch #23271
    area-infrastructure
